verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The whole earth is filled, the whole earth is filled
Filled with Your glory, filled with Your glory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My whole life is filled, my whole life is filled
Filled with Your glory, filled with Your glory

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your love is alive, Your love is alive
Your love is beating inside of my heart
and my soul and my mind

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Your love is alive, Your love is alive
Your love is leading me into the way
and the truth and the life

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The whole earth is filled, the whole earth is filled
Filled with Your glory, filled with Your glory

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
My whole life is filled, my whole life is filled
Filled with Your glory, filled with Your glory

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Your love is alive, Your love is alive
Your love is beating inside of my heart
and my soul and my mind

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Your love is alive, Your love is alive
Your love is leading me into the way
and the truth and the life

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Blinded by darkness or lost out at sea
Even in death You're always with me

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
And when I am fearful I won't be afraid
Oh Spirit remind me Your presence remains

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Your love is alive, Your love is alive
Your love is beating inside of my heart
and my soul and my mind

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
Your love is alive, Your love is alive
Your love is leading me into the way
and the truth and the life
